lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Esau plan to do to Jacob? Why?
answers: Kill him for stealing his blessing
Tell Isaac what Jacob had done
Throw Jacob into a pit
Take all of Jacob’s animals

questions.text: Where did Jacob’s parents send him? Why?
answers: To his uncle Laban’s to hide from Esau
To Egypt to find safety there
To Bethel to make a sacrifice
To the desert to live alone

questions.text: What did Jacob use for his pillow?
answers: A stone
A blanket
A pile of leaves
His robe

questions.text: What did Jacob see in his dream?
answers: A ladder or stairway to heaven, angels going up and down
A lion standing beside him
A great storm coming toward him
A river flowing through the desert

questions.text: Who was standing at the top of the ladder or stairway in Jacob’s dream?
answers: God
An angel with a sword
Abraham
His future wife

questions.text: What did God say to Jacob in the dream?
answers: He gave Jacob the same promises he made to Abraham
He told Jacob to return home immediately
He warned Jacob never to trust Esau
He said Jacob would become a mighty warrior

questions.text: What did Jacob do with the stone after the dream?
answers: Stood it up, poured oil on it
Threw it into the river
Buried it under a tree
Carried it with him on his journey

questions.text: What promise did Jacob make to God?
answers: If you’ll be with me, then you will be my God
I will return home tomorrow
I will never speak to Esau again
I will build a city in this place

questions.text: Jacob called that place “Bethel.” What did Bethel mean?
answers: House of God
Place of dreams
Stairway of heaven
Land of blessing

questions.text: What special name for God do we learn from this story?
answers: The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob
The Lord of the mountains
The God who appeared in dreams
The Creator of the sky and land
